author: Bradford Betz
title: California’s coronavirus ‘stay at home’ order: Here are the guidelines
description: Some 40 million Californians on Monday were adjusting to the governor’s sweeping order for Golden State residents to “stay at home,” in an effort to halt the spread of the novel coronavirus.
content:
